document.full_text: u.s. rights envoy robert king on friday won the release of an american citizen detained in north korea on unspecified charges for the past six months, as he wrapped up a visit to the secretive state to assess its pleas for food aid.
document.title: north korea to free u.s. citizen held for six months
lines_and_colors: u.s. rights envoy robert king on friday won the release of an american citizen detained in north korea on unspecified charges for the past six months, as he wrapped up a visit to the secretive state to assess its pleas for food aid.
